recoursemech: The Company has agreed to cooperate and comply with the Swiss Data Protection Authorities with respect to Swiss data, with the appropriate EU Data Protection Authorities with respect to EU Human Resources Data, and is participating in the Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program with respect to non-employee data from the EU.
